content.text1: We love families! Our kids and youth teams walk alongside the next generation in learning to love and follow Jesus, while equipping parents to disciple their kids at home. We’d love to connect with you through our Sunday and midweek experiences.

content.header2: Children's program for Infants to Grade 5
content.text1: We exist to help kids understand and live Jesus' message, develop relationships through group experiences, equip our community to invest in our kids, and partner with parents as they raise disciples.

image1.alt: Kids laughing and playing together in our kids program.

content.text1: We walk alongside our youth as they learn to love and follow Jesus, sharing his message with others. Our program includes Jr. Highs (grades 6-8) and Sr. Highs (grades 9-12) with a mix of online and in-person events. We connect midweek to have fun, engage in small groups, and talk about Jesus.

list.title: Curriculum
list.text: Our mission is to develop lifelong followers of Jesus. Our approach is to teach stories within the context of the overarching Biblical narrative, so that kids and youth can learn each story and how it connects to God’s big story. Click here to preview.
